item.title: Possible groundwater escape?, 4th September
item.description:
Water escaping from water meter box on pavement outside #12 campden road. Severn Trent have inspected and dug up, but said there is no leak. Suspect groundwater issue?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Campden Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same
